Ash’s Journey with Hyper

“I was working full-time as a Sales Director, balancing family commitments, and yet, I couldn’t shake a powerful idea I had for a startup: Empiraa. The concept was big, but so were my responsibilities. I knew I needed a partner who could help me move this vision forward in the few hours I could carve out each week. That’s when I connected with Hyper.

With just 1-2 hours weekly, the Hyper team worked with me to sharpen Empiraa’s mission. They helped me focus on the core challenge: empowering teams to build clear, actionable strategies. Together, we refined my vision, shaping Empiraa into something that could truly change how companies approach strategic planning.

But the journey didn’t stop there. Hyper supported me through the challenging process of fundraising, guiding me in perfecting my pitch and helping me secure $750k in funding. This investment wasn’t just financial—it gave me the confidence to take the leap and commit to Empiraa full-time. Today, I’m fully dedicated to building Empiraa, and I’m grateful to have Hyper cheering me on. They weren’t just advisors; they were true partners in turning this vision into something real.”
